balanceOfUnderlying(uint256,address,addr.details: You can think about debt and collateral tokens as cToken in compound. They represent ownership of debt or collateral in given Silo. This method converts that ownership to exact amount of underlying token.

params._assetTotalDeposits: Total amount of assets that has been deposited or borrowed. For collateral token, use `totalDeposits` to get this value. For debt token, use `totalBorrowAmount` to get this value.
params._shareToken: share token address. It's the collateral and debt share token address. You can find these addresses in: - `ISilo.AssetStorage.collateralToken` - `ISilo.AssetStorage.collateralOnlyToken` - `ISilo.AssetStorage.debtToken`
params._user: wallet address for which to read data

returns._0: balance of underlying token deposited or borrowed of given user

params._silo: Silo address from which to read data

returns._0: APY with 18 decimals

borrowShare(address,address,address).details: Debt token represents a share in total debt of given asset. This method calls balanceOf(_user) on that token.

params._asset: asset address for which to read data
params._silo: Silo address from which to read data
params._user: wallet address for which to read data

returns._0: balance of debt token of given user

params._amount: amount for which to calculate fee

returns._0: Amount of token fee to be paid

calculateBorrowValue(address,address,add.details: It dynamically adds interest earned to borrowed amount

params._asset: token address for which calculation are done
params._silo: Silo address from which to read data
params._user: account for which calculation are done

returns._0: value of debt denominated in quote token with 18 decimal

calculateCollateralValue(address,address.details: It dynamically adds interest earned. Takes for account collateral only deposits as well.

params._asset: token address for which calculation are done
params._silo: Silo address from which to read data
params._user: account for which calculation are done

returns._0: value of collateral denominated in quote token with 18 decimal

collateralBalanceOfUnderlying(address,ad.details: It reads directly from storage so interest generated between last update and now is not taken for account

params._asset: asset address for which to read data
params._silo: Silo address from which to read data
params._user: wallet address for which to read data

returns._0: balance of underlying tokens for the given user

collateralOnlyDeposits(address,address).details: It reads directly from storage so interest generated between last update and now is not taken for account

params._asset: asset address for which to read data
params._silo: Silo address from which to read data

returns._0: amount of all "collateralOnly" deposits made for given asset

debtBalanceOfUnderlying(address,address,.details: It reads directly from storage so interest generated between last update and now is not taken for account

params._asset: asset address for which to read data
params._silo: Silo address from which to read data
params._user: wallet address for which to read data

returns._0: balance of underlying token owed

params._silo: Silo address from which to read data

returns._0: APY with 18 decimals

getBorrowAmount(address,address,address,.details: Interest is calculated based on the provided timestamp with is expected to be current time.

params._asset: token address for which calculation are done
params._silo: Silo address from which to read data
params._user: account for which calculation are done

returns._0: total amount of asset user needs to repay at provided timestamp

params._asset: asset for which to calculate interest rate
params._silo: Silo address from which to read data

returns._0: IInterestRateModel interest rates model object

getUserLTV(address,address).details: Each Silo has multiple asset markets (bridge assets + unique asset). This function calculates a sum of all deposits and all borrows denominated in quote token. Returns fraction between borrow value and deposit value with 18 decimals.

params._silo: Silo address from which to read data
params._user: wallet address for which LTV is calculated

getUserLiquidationThreshold(address,addr.details: Methodology for calculating liquidation threshold is as follows. Each Silo is combined form multiple assets (bridge assets + unique asset). Each of these assets may have different liquidation threshold. That means effective liquidation threshold must be calculated per asset based on current deposits and borrows of given account.

params._silo: Silo address from which to read data
params._user: wallet address for which to read data

getUserMaximumLTV(address,address).details: Methodology for calculating maximum LTV is as follows. Each Silo is combined form multiple assets (bridge assets + unique asset). Each of these assets may have different maximum Loan-To-Value for opening borrow position. That means effective maximum LTV must be calculated per asset based on current deposits and borrows of given account.

params._silo: Silo address from which to read data
params._user: wallet address for which to read data

getUtilization(address,address).details: Utilization is calculated current values in storage so it does not take for account earned interest and ever-increasing total borrow amount. It assumes `Model.DP()` = 100%.

params._silo: Silo address from which to read data

returns._0: utilization value

params._silo: Silo address from which to read data
params._user: wallet address for which to read data

returns._0: TRUE if user has position (debt or borrow) in any asset

params._silo: Silo address from which to read data
params._user: wallet address for which to read data

returns._0: TRUE if user borrowed any amount of any asset, otherwise FALSE
always true

liquidity(address,address).details: Amount of token that is available for borrowing.

params._asset: asset address for which to read data
params._silo: Silo address from which to read data

returns._0: Silo liquidity

protocolFees(address,address).details: It reads directly from storage so interest generated between last update and now is not taken for account

params._asset: asset address for which to read data
params._silo: Silo address from which to read data

returns._0: amount of fees earned by protocol to date

totalBorrowAmount(address,address).details: It reads directly from storage so interest generated between last update and now is not taken for account

params._asset: asset address for which to read data
params._silo: Silo address from which to read data

returns._0: amount of asset that has been borrowed

totalBorrowShare(address,address).details: Debt token represents a share in total debt of given asset

params._asset: asset address for which to read data
params._silo: Silo address from which to read data

returns._0: totalSupply of debt token

totalDeposits(address,address).details: It reads directly from storage so interest generated between last update and now is not taken for account

params._asset: asset address for which to read data
params._silo: Silo address from which to read data

returns._0: amount of all deposits made for given asset

balanceOfUnderlying(uint256,address,addr.notice: Get underlying balance of collateral or debt token

borrowAPY(address,address).notice: Yearly interest rate for borrowing asset token, dynamically calculated for current block timestamp

borrowShare(address,address,address).notice: Get debt token balance of a user

calcFee(uint256).notice: Calculate amount of entry fee for given amount

calculateBorrowValue(address,address,add.notice: Calculate value of borrowed asset by user

calculateCollateralValue(address,address.notice: Calculate value of collateral asset for user

collateralBalanceOfUnderlying(address,ad.notice: Get underlying balance of all deposits of given token of given user including "collateralOnly" deposits

collateralOnlyDeposits(address,address).notice: Get amount of asset token that has been deposited to Silo with option "collateralOnly"

debtBalanceOfUnderlying(address,address,.notice: Get amount of debt of underlying token for given user

depositAPY(address,address).notice: Yearly interest rate for depositing asset token, dynamically calculated for current block timestamp

getBorrowAmount(address,address,address,.notice: Calculates current borrow amount for user with interest

getUserLiquidationThreshold(address,addr.notice: Get combined liquidation threshold for a user

getUserMaximumLTV(address,address).notice: Get combined maximum Loan-To-Value for a user

getUtilization(address,address).notice: Calculates fraction between borrowed amount and the current liquidity of tokens for given asset denominated in percentage

hasPosition(address,address).notice: Check if user has position (debt or borrow) in any asset

inDebt(address,address).notice: Check if user is in debt

protocolFees(address,address).notice: Get amount of fees earned by protocol to date

totalBorrowAmount(address,address).notice: Get amount of asset that has been borrowed

totalBorrowAmountWithInterest(address,ad.notice: returns total borrow amount with interest dynamically calculated at current block timestamp

totalDeposits(address,address).notice: Get amount of asset token that has been deposited to Silo

totalDepositsWithInterest(address,addres.notice: returns total deposits with interest dynamically calculated at current block timestamp

userdoc.notice: Utility contract that simplifies reading data from Silo protocol contracts
